graph_title: Percentage of main research groups leaded by women
indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
SDG_GOAL: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
SDG_INDICATOR: Percentage of main research groups leaded by women
indicator_level: Result (offer information on compliance with the SDG objectives at the UPO level)
